Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers will face the Boston Red Sox at Comerica Park on Sunday, September 1, 2024, at 8:10am AEST.
Tarik Skubal (15-4, 2.58 ERA) will pitch for the Tigers, while Nick Pivetta (5-9, 4.61 ERA) will counter for the Red Sox.
The Tigers have a 57% chance of winning according to simulations, and the Red Sox are favored to cover the 1.5-run line 62% of the time.
Betting odds for the Tigers to win are $1.71, while the Red Sox are listed at $2.15.
The over/under for total runs scored is set at 7.5, with odds of $1.91 for both over and under.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match-up is scheduled for Sunday, September 1, 2024, at Comerica Park.
All times and dates are in Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST).
